title: Get WFS Dataset
code: library(kwb.fisbroker) #> Loading ISO 19139 XML schemas... #> Loading ISO 19115 codelists... #> Loading IANA mime types... #> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8.  berlin_bezirke <- kwb.fisbroker::get_wfs_dataset(dataset_id = "s_wfs_alkis_bezirk") #> Importing WFS dataset_id 's_wfs_alkis_bezirk' from FIS-Broker ... [ows4R][INFO] OWSGetCapabilities - Fetching https://fbinter.stadt-berlin.de/fb/wfs/data/senstadt/s_wfs_alkis_bezirk?service=WFS&version=2.0.0&request=GetCapabilities  #>    |                                                                               |                                                                      |   0%   |                                                                               |======================================================================| 100% #> ok. (2.36s) str(berlin_bezirke) #> sf [12 × 7] (S3: sf/tbl_df/tbl/data.frame) #>  $ gml_id: chr [1:12] "s_wfs_alkis_bezirk.1" "s_wfs_alkis_bezirk.2" "s_wfs_alkis_bezirk.3" "s_wfs_alkis_bezirk.4" ... #>  $ gem   : int [1:12] 3 9 7 2 6 11 4 10 5 12 ... #>  $ namgem: chr [1:12] "Pankow" "Treptow-Köpenick" "Tempelhof-Schöneberg" "Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg" ... #>  $ namlan: chr [1:12] "Berlin" "Berlin" "Berlin" "Berlin" ... #>  $ lan   : int [1:12] 11 11 11 11 11 11 11 11 11 11 ... #>  $ name  : int [1:12] 11000003 11000009 11000007 11000002 11000006 11000011 11000004 11000010 11000005 11000012 ... #>  $ geom  :sfc_MULTIPOLYGON of length 12; first list element: List of 4 #>   ..$ :List of 1 #>   .. ..$ : num [1:7, 1:2] 13.4 13.4 13.4 13.4 13.4 ... #>   ..$ :List of 1 #>   .. ..$ : num [1:6, 1:2] 13.4 13.4 13.4 13.4 13.4 ... #>   ..$ :List of 1 #>   .. ..$ : num [1:18, 1:2] 13.5 13.5 13.5 13.5 13.5 ... #>   ..$ :List of 2 #>   .. ..$ : num [1:3251, 1:2] 13.5 13.5 13.5 13.5 13.5 ... #>   .. ..$ : num [1:7, 1:2] 13.4 13.4 13.4 13.4 13.4 ... #>   ..- attr(*, "class")= chr [1:3] "XY" "MULTIPOLYGON" "sfg" #>  - attr(*, "sf_column")= chr "geom" #>  - attr(*, "agr")= Factor w/ 3 levels "constant","aggregate",..: NA NA NA NA NA NA #>   ..- attr(*, "names")= chr [1:6] "gml_id" "gem" "namgem" "namlan" ...  DT::datatable(berlin_bezirke)

title: Get WFS Dataset
code: ### Define Helper Function plot_bezirke <- function(layer) {      ## fix as name for "geometry" (sf v1.0-7) seems to be renamed to "geom" in    ## sf v1.0-8 (or if not might be different on macos)   sf_geometry_name <- c("geom", "geometry")   columns <- names(layer)[names(layer) %in% c("namgem", sf_geometry_name)]      plot(layer[,columns]) }  plot_bezirke(berlin_bezirke)

title: Get WFS Dataset
code: ### Plot to check if Berlin boundaries are plotted correctly. ### Set target CRS crs_target <- 4326  basemap <- berlin_bezirke %>%   sf::st_transform(crs = crs_target) %>%   leaflet::leaflet() %>%   leaflet::addTiles() %>%   leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>%   leaflet::addPolygons(stroke = FALSE,                         fillColor = rainbow(n = length(berlin_bezirke$namgem)),                         fill = TRUE) %>%    leaflet::addLegend(     position = "topright",     colors = rainbow(n = length(berlin_bezirke$namgem)),     labels = berlin_bezirke$namgem,     title = "Berliner Bezirke")  basemap

title: R Package for Getting Spatial Data from FIS-Broker
text: installing latest release R package run following code :
code: # Enable repository from kwb-r options(repos = c(   kwbr = 'https://kwb-r.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Download and install kwb.fisbroker in R install.packages('kwb.fisbroker')  # Browse the kwb.fisbroker manual pages help(package = 'kwb.fisbroker')

title: Get WFS Dataset — get_wfs_dataset
code: get_wfs_dataset(   dataset_id = "s_wfs_alkis_bezirk",   service_version = "2.0.0",   srs_name = "EPSG:4258",   debug = TRUE )

title: Get WFS Dataset — get_wfs_dataset
text: dataset_id id wfs dataset (default: "s_wfs_alkis_bezirk"). Needs checked manually described : Go : https://fbinter.stadt-berlin.de/fb/ Click WFS Dataset Read content Rechneraddresse opened tab. basename url required dataset id! service_version one "1.0.0", "1.1.0" "2.0.0" (default: "2.0.0") srs_name one "EPSG:4258" "EPSG:25833" (default: "EPSG:4258") debug prints debug messages TRUE (default: TRUE)

title: Get WFS Dataset — get_wfs_dataset
code: berlin_bezirke <- kwb.fisbroker::get_wfs_dataset(dataset_id = "s_wfs_alkis_bezirk") #> Importing WFS dataset_id 's_wfs_alkis_bezirk' from FIS-Broker ...
